result.execSummary:
The defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  Undergo any counseling/treatment per agent.  COG group to be completed if not completed in prison.    Absolute Sobriety.  Not to possess controlled substances w/o valid prescription and must notify agent w/in 48 hours if one is received.  Not to go to taverns/bars or business where primary purpose of business is sale of alcohol.  Random UA's & PBTs by the agent and law enforcement.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann in custody.  Linda A Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states cases and appearances.  Parties rec/rev PSI.  Atty Klopp notes corrections to PSI.  Sister and mother of DE makes statement on behalf of DE.  State makes recommendations.  Atty Klopp responds.  Parties discuss sentence credit.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.  DE advised of voting rights, firearms warnings and appeal rights.

Pay all fines/restitution/court costs and supervision fees
Sentencing hearing on May 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann in custody.  Linda Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and appearances.  Parties in agreement to do plea today w/PSI to be requested.  Court states his understanding of the agreement.  Parties in agreement.  Atty Klopp states DE will waive his right to prelim.  Court questions DE on waiver of prelim in 14CF17/accepts/finds probable cause and binds over.  Atty Klopp acknowledges rec. information in 14CF17/waives reading and pleads NC to Count 3 only as well as Ct 3 in 13CF135.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Court orders PSI to be completed no later than 4/25/2014.  Bonds continued.

Cts 1 and 2:  Dismissed/read-in
Ct 3:  NC

13CF135
Ct 3:  NC - NOT as a repeater
Cts 1, 2, 4 and 5:  Dismissed/read-in  Sentencing hearing scheduled for May 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Cover Letter from Klopp Law Office

Pre-trial conference on February 7, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Return date on February 18, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Hayden J. Breutzmann appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Sue M. Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does qualify.  Attorney Klopp likely to be assigned.   Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State request $10,000 cash w/ conditions.  Warrant history and criminal history.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Time limits waived.  $5000.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/ T.T. (co defendant).  May not possess or use controlled substances w/out a valid Rx.  Carry Rx at all times if such valid Rx.  May not leave State of WI.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 7, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Return date scheduled for February 18, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
